document.body:
broken cool.
Food and Drink
July 11, 2012
I've Got A Viral - July 11th, 2012 - McDonald's Wants You To Know How To Make The Big Mac Sauce
From Life Files:
McDonald’s is finally getting in front of their online image with these new videos that show us filtered, but still revealing, things we’ve always wanted to know about the brand. Try this Big Mac recipe at home and let us know how the special sauce came out – the magic ingredients are mayo, sweet pickle relish, yellow mustard, onion powder, white wine vinegar, garlic powder, and paprika.
Posted by broken cool in Food and Drink , Video | Permalink | Comments (0)
Reblog (0) | | | | | | Digg This | Save to del.icio.us

June 15, 2012
Jay-Z Opening 40/40 Club Inside Barclays Center
According to reports , Jay-Z is working on plans to open a branch of his 40/40 Club inside the new Barclays Center in Brooklyn.
The new 40/40 will reportedly be 9,000 square feet and will open on September 28.
The venue will be open to ticket-holders during games, concerts and other events.
There are also plans to bring Jay-Z's 40/40 Club to airports throughout the US.
Spotted: Prefix
Posted by broken cool in Celebrity , Food and Drink , News | Permalink | Comments (0)
Reblog (0) | | | | | | Digg This | Save to del.icio.us
June 13, 2012
Burger King's Bacon Sundae Drops Tomorrow
As part of a limited time 'summer menu', Burger King will launch its bacon sundae tomorrow...you aint ready for this.
The dessert has 510 calories, 18 grams of fat and 61 grams of sugar...so something nice and light for those hot summer days...SMH.
Spotted: Life Files

May 10, 2012
Jay-Z Launches D'usse Cognac In New York City
According to the Life Files , Jay-Z launched D'usse (pronounced “dew-say”) Cognac at an ultra private event in New York City last night. The cognac, made by Bacardi, is expected to compete with Hennessy.
You'll be able to drink like Hov on the cheap as the Cognac is expected to sell for $44.99 for a 750-ml bottle.
For more information on the brand go here.
Spotted: Life Files
Posted by broken cool in Celebrity , Food and Drink , News , Photos | Permalink | Comments (0)

April 18, 2012
Birdman's GT (Grand Touring) Vodka In Stores April 23rd
Via a tweet, Birdman has announced that his GT (Grand Touring) Vodka will hit store shelves on April 23rd:
RT The wait is over @ GTVODKA is in stores April 23rd... —BIRDMAN (@BIRDMAN5STAR) April 17, 2012
Over the past few weeks, Birdman has been tweeting some of the advertising around the brand:
The vodka launches in two flavours, Watermelon and Coconut and comes in this deluxe packaging:
For more information visit the GT Vodka website.
